name: Horse Cart Derby Champions 2016- Free Wild Horses Racing Show in Marvel Equestrian Township Adventure
name_original: Horse Cart Derby Champions 2016- Free Wild Horses Racing Show in Marvel Equestrian Township Adventure
description:
Get ready for a unique virtual horse racing adventure added to the iphone store. This Horse cart racing 3d simulator game brings you a fun racing horse adventure. Latest tapping quest to tap tap to make the virtual horse run faster and win the cart race. The horse racing has been inspired by the international event, horse chariot race and horse carriage races from roman times.

Become the sulky Hero of endless Tap Racing Quest! This stallion driven cart game is more exciting than the simple farm horse simulator and horse rider games. Get ready for some wild horse adventure with the most delicate horse craft simulator experience ever. This game puts your thumbs on fire. TAP left and right to avoid obstacles and spectacles. Enjoy this as a past time sport on the winning race horse. With no betting mode this racing horse game is suitable for all the kids, boys, girls and adults equally.

In Horse Cart Race Champions 2016 you get to be the virtual stallion carriage race driver. Enjoy the perfect wild horse riding simulator with tap quest and lets see if you tap harder and faster to win against the computer. With Horse Cart Race Champions 2016, we wanted to make something different from tap car racing in the city. Tap faster in the Horse Cart Derby Champions 2016.
